name: src/fast_transformer.js
FastTransformer
description: Removes comments and whitespace from a PHP script, by calling a Web service.

name: DEFAULT_ADDRESS
description: The default address that the server is listening on.

name: constructor
description: Initializes a new instance of the class.

params.name: minifier
params.description: The instance providing access to the minifier settings.

name: _minifier
description: The instance providing access to the minifier settings.

name: listening
description: Value indicating whether the PHP process is currently listening.

name: close
description: Terminates the underlying PHP process: stops the server from accepting new connections. It does nothing if the server is already closed.

return.description: Completes when the PHP process is finally terminated.

name: listen
description: Starts the underlying PHP process: begins accepting connections. It does nothing if the server is already started.

return.description: The port used by the PHP process.

params.name: script
params.description: The path to the PHP script.

name: _getPort
description: Gets an ephemeral port chosen by the system.

return.description: A port that the server can listen on.

name: src/index.js
phpMinify
description: Create a new instance of the plug-in.

name: src/minifier.js
Minifier
description: Removes PHP comments and whitespace by applying the [`php_strip_whitespace()`](https://secure.php.net/manual/en/function.php-strip-whitespace.php) function.

name: constructor
description: Initializes a new instance of the class.

params.name: binary
params.description: The path to the PHP executable.

name: binary
description: The path to the PHP executable.

name: silent
description: Value indicating whether to silent the plug-in output.

name: _transformer
description: The instance used to process the PHP code.

params.name: encoding
params.description: The encoding type if the chunk is a string.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to invoke when the supplied chunk has been processed.
